activities: IdentityX allows you to use your smartphone or tablet to authenticate your identity with unprecedented accuracy using an innovative combination of device identification, PIN, biometrics, and location-based security factors. IdentityX technology combines multiple authentication techniques: something you have (a smart phone), something you know (a PIN/passphrase), something you are (multi-modal biometrics – such as face, voice), and somewhere you are (GPS). Further, IdentityX employs dynamic security levels based on transaction risk as well as multi-factor fusion to attain the greatest authentication fidelity available
contacttitle1: Regional Head of Customer Support Americas

personaldata: Customer data is to be processed.  Does not include manually processed data.
